content:
{"name": "The Latin American Association", "alternate_name": "", "description": "We will be serving families by appointment only each week on a first-come, first-serve basis. Families in need of food can contact our Family Stabilization and Wellness department at 404 638-1839.
* SNAP assistance available in English and Spanish. 
* Utility Bills (Light, Gas, Water) in name of the applicant
* Check stubs/ Employment Letter/ Self-Employment Form
* To apply complete an online application at www.gateway.ga.gov or on paper with the local Department of Family and Children Services (DFCS). Send in required and verified documents.

* Also has immigration services avaialble: Call 404.471.1889 or email  immigrationservices@thelaa.org", "email": "", "url": "https://thelaa.org/es/lo-que-hacemos/estabilizacion-y-bienestar-familiar/programa-de-necesidades-basicas/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2750 Buford Highway Northeast", "address_2": "1st Floor", "city": "Atlanta", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30324", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.8290248, "longitude": -84.346071}, "phones": [{"number": "(404) 638-1800", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Social Security Card Required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Requires ID for adults and birth certificates for children in the household"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of Residency (Lease contract)"}]}
